recommendations: 1. IOPC Complaint - Police failures in investigation/disclosure
2. LGSCO Complaint - Local Authority failures (candour, proportionality)
4. HCPC Referral - Social worker professional standards
6. Ofcom Complaint - Channel 4 Broadcasting Code violations
7. CONSIDER: Human Rights Act claim - multiple Article 6/8 violations
